name: After School Program
description: The Richmond Neighborhood Beacon offers a fully comprehensive after school program from dismissal until 7:00 PM at the school site. Enrichment After School Program Offers 6th - 8th grade youth an opportunity to investigate their interests and build soft and hard skills at Beacon. Youth will always participate in a check-in circle, collaborative hands-on activities and a learning debrief. They will also get a chance to show off their skills in the classroom or at culminating family night. Tuesday

cost: This is a fee based service, sliding scale is available with proof of income requirements.
